name: The Forgotten Books (gamedevwithmark)
description:
This game is made for my 1st interactive devlog video, which you can watch here: https://youtu.be/A7RvYXTvlKk

Find the books to open the door! Your parrot will help you everywhere.

Assets used:

  • 2D Animated Pirate [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/2d-animated-pirate-165005]
  • Free Game Items [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-game-items-131764]
  • Free 2D Pirate Sprites [https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-2d-pirate-sprites]
  • Ababil Bird Full Sprite [https://yudemgoy.itch.io/ababil-bird-full-sprite]
  • Jungle Animal Sound FX [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/animals/jungle-animal-sound-fx-13491#content]
  • FREE Casual Game SFX Pack [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-54116#content]
  • Footsteps - Essentials [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-189879]
  • Free Sound Effects Pack [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155776#content]
  • SoundBits | Free Sound FX Collection [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/soundbits-free-sound-fx-collection-31837]
  • Platformer Art: Extended Tileset [https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-art-extended-tileset]
  • Effect textures and prefabs [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/effect-textures-and-prefabs-109031]
  • Pirate Music Album - 050418 [https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/pirate-music-album-050418-118488]
